thread.title: Is Badshaho script being reworked?
thread.title_full: Is Badshaho script being reworked? | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Is Badshaho script being reworked?
text:
Deccan Chronicle | Asira Tarannum | October 08, 2015, 23.44 pm Ajay Devgn Ajay Devgn starrer Badshaho was to go on the floors early this year but now we hear that will only happen after April 2016, as the script is being re-worked. The actor has suggested some changes in the second half to director Milan Luthria, which the latter has agreed to.
A source close to the project told us, “Those changes are being made now and that’s why the film has been postponed. We were ready to start shooting but the film will now go on floors only after April 2016.” Shruti Haasan, who was roped in for it, has walked out as the film was delayed.
A new actress will be roped in after the required changes are made to the script. The film was to clash with Hrithik Roshan-starrer Mohenjodaro earlier but now that the release date of Badshaho has changed, the clash has been averted. It will now hit the theatres on Good Friday next year. Milan Luthria remained unavailable for comment.
